metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12085 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Liblouis 3.6.0 has a stack-based Buffer Overflow in the function parseChars in compileTranslationTable.c, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-11440.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.5
liblouis-data - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.5
liblouis2 - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.5
python-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.5
python3-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-2ubuntu1.5').
